thread.title: Fuck Everything About This Story — Howbow Dah??
thread.title_full: Fuck Everything About This Story — Howbow Dah??

author: Perez Hilton
title: Fuck Everything About This Story — Howbow Dah??
text:
Remember the Cash me ousside girl?? Who could forget her ?? 
Her real name is Danielle Bregoli , and guess what — she's (probably) richer than you are! 
That's because Bregoli is parlaying her cash me ousside how bow dah fame into personal appearances that are netting her A MINIMUM OF $30,000 A DAY!!! 
That's right — the cash me ousside girl gets THIRTY FUCKIN' GRAND to show up at clubs and festivals — and per the TMZ report, that number bumps up to a minimum of $40,000 if/when she leaves the country for an event. 
What in the fuck??? 
No, seriously — WHAT IN THE FUCK??? 
Apparently, a bar in New York offered Bregoli $5,000 to make an appearance, and she "just laughed and passed" on the money, according to TMZ . 
So the Cash me ousside girl is making SO much money on public appearances at $30,000 a pop, she can turn down a measly $5,000 without even thinking about it for a moment. 
Wow. 
And how's your career going, dear Perezcious reader?! Are you gonna make 30 grand just for showing up at the club tonight??
